name: SCRUM SPRINT SCHEDULE
description:
Scrum rituals

The 4 Scrum rituals that the Sprint encompasses:


  • Daily Scrum every day (20 mins max)
  • Sprint Review once per sprint (2 hours max)
  • Sprint Retrospective once per sprint (1 hours max)
  • Sprint Planning once per sprint (3 hours max)

And optionally…

  • Backlog Refinement as a group (1 hour per week)


It useful to get some time together as a team to perform group Backlog Refinement — but in practice, this is an activity that also happens throughout the Sprint.
